item.title: 秘鲁经济摆脱政治动荡，2025年实现3.4%增长
item.description: 2025年，秘鲁经济连续第二年实现3%以上的增长，尽管这个安第斯国家过去十年历经七任总统更迭，政治动荡不断，但经济仍持续保持强劲势头。【原文：Peru posted growth of better than 3% for a second straight year in 2025, as the economy continues to power through the political chaos that’s seen the Andean nation cycle through seven presidents in the past decade.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务债权人将救助方案提交评级机构寻求认可
item.description: 知情人士透露，泰晤士水务公司的高级债权人正寻求评级机构批准一项关键的救援计划，以防止这家陷入困境的公用事业公司陷入破产。【原文：Thames Water’s senior creditors are seeking approval from ratings agencies for a crucial rescue plan that would prevent the ailing utility from slipping into insolvency, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 荷兰央行行长称乌克兰加入欧盟将提振该集团
item.description: 荷兰央行行长奥拉夫·斯莱彭表示，乌克兰加入欧盟将为该集团的单一市场带来"显著推动力"。【原文：Ukraine joining the European Union would give a “significant boost” to the bloc’s single market, according to Dutch Central Bank governor Olaf Sleijpen.】

item.title: 大豆价格攀升，因美国敦促贸易伙伴履行承诺
item.description: 周一，大豆价格扭转早盘跌势转而走高，交易员们正试图解读特朗普总统关税政策调整将如何影响美国农产品出口。【原文：Soybeans reversed earlier losses to turn higher Monday as traders tried to unpack how changes to President Donald Trump’s tariff regime will impact US crop shipments.】

item.title: 墨西哥详述如何击毙头号通缉毒枭
item.description: 墨西哥政府详细披露了如何锁定该国头号通缉毒枭的行动细节，并强调美国安全人员并未积极参与总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆迄今为止与贩毒集团最直接的对抗行动。【原文：Mexico’s government laid out details of how it located the country’s most-wanted drug kingpin, stressing that US security agents didn’t actively participate in President Claudia Sheinbaum’s most direct confrontation with the cartels yet.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩银行称流动性不足以支撑复苏计划，面临破产风险
item.description: 黎巴嫩商业银行缺乏偿还存款所需的流动性，该国政府提出的一项旨在填补金融体系800亿美元缺口的提案，使得本已艰难的经济复苏启动谈判更趋复杂。【原文：Lebanon’s commercial banks lack the liquidity required to repay depositors under a government proposal aimed at plugging an $80 billion gap in the financial system, an adviser to the lenders said, complicating an already difficult negotiation to kick-start the country’s economic recovery.】

item.title: PayPal股价暴跌后引发收购兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，数字支付先驱PayPal控股公司股价暴跌导致市值蒸发近半后，正吸引潜在买家的收购兴趣。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc., the digital payments pioneer, is attracting takeover interest from potential buyers after a stock slide wiped out almost half of its value, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 软件股、支付股暴跌，因Citrini发文警示人工智能风险
item.description: 周一，随着Citrini Research发布报告阐述人工智能可能对全球经济各领域构成的潜在风险，物流、支付及软件类股应声暴跌。【原文：Delivery, payments, and software stocks slid sharply Monday after Citrini Research published a report laying out the potential risks that artificial intelligence could pose to various segments of the global economy.】

item.title: 德国将萨尔茨吉特绿色钢铁援助提高至13亿欧元
item.description: 德国将把对萨尔茨吉特公司低碳钢项目的资助增加至13亿欧元。【原文：Germany will increase its funding for Salzgitter AG’s low-carbon steel project to €1.3 billion.】

item.title: 美国国债走高，因特朗普新贸易战令市场动荡不安
item.description: 本周初，美国国债价格上涨，因最高法院推翻特朗普加征关税的决定后，特朗普总统誓言继续推进贸易战，给全球市场带来新的不确定性。【原文：Treasuries rose at the start of the week as President Donald Trump’s vows to press ahead with his trade war after the Supreme Court struck down his tariffs cast new uncertainty over global markets.】

item.title: 据称多家银行集团聘请FTI担任雷森谈判顾问
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着巴西糖和乙醇生产商Raízen SA深陷债务危机，其部分银行债权人正聘请FTI咨询公司担任顾问。【原文：A group of bank creditors to Raízen SA is hiring FTI Consulting Inc. as an adviser as the Brazilian sugar and ethanol producer falters under the weight of its debts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利F2i基金在欧洲基础设施建设推动下接近10亿欧元规模
item.description: 意大利最大的独立基础设施基金管理公司F2i SGR，其信贷资产规模已逼近10亿欧元（约合12亿美元），这源于欧洲基础设施现代化对私营融资日益增长的需求。【原文：F2i SGR, Italy’s largest independent infrastructure fund manager, brought its credit assets close to €1 billion ($1.2 billion) as demand grows for private financing to modernize European infrastructure.】

item.title: Anthropic首席执行官将与赫格塞斯会面，五角大楼合作争议持续发酵
item.description: 五角大楼一位高级官员透露，人工智能初创企业Anthropic PBC的首席执行官达里奥·阿莫代将于周二会见美国国防部长皮特·赫格塞斯。此前该公司与军方就合同谈判陷入僵局，因其坚持要求为技术使用设置防护措施。【原文：Anthropic PBC Chief Executive Officer Dario Amodei will meet with US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth on Tuesday, according to a senior Pentagon official, as contract talks with the artificial intelligence startup remain deadlocked over the company’s insistence on guardrails for use of its technology.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚鹰派转向掩盖比索深层困境
item.description: 哥伦比亚比索在经济与政治困境中逆势坚挺，此前货币政策意外转向鹰派立场，强化了主导市场的套利交易。【原文：Colombia’s peso is defying economic and political woes after a surprisingly hawkish pivot in monetary policy reinforced the dominant carry trade.】

item.title: 标普500指数因关税问题下跌，英伟达财报前上涨
item.description: 周一美国股市走低，因特朗普总统针对最高法院对其大规模关税的裁决作出回应，宣布对美国进口商品全面加征15%关税，引发全球贸易新动荡。英伟达公司股价成为亮点，在周三财报发布前持续上涨。【原文：US stocks traded lower on Monday as President Donald Trump responded to the Supreme Court’s ruling against his sweeping tariffs by imposing a new, across-the-board 15% levy on US imports, sowing fresh confusion around global trade. Shares of Nvidia Corp. were a bright spot, advancing before Wednesday’s earnings report.】

item.title: 欧盟暂停美欧贸易协议，关税动荡引发不确定性
item.description: 欧盟冻结了与美国的贸易协定批准程序，直至特朗普总统明确其颠覆性关税计划，此举为本已紧张的双边关系注入了经济动荡。【原文：The European Union froze ratification of its US trade deal until President Donald Trump solidifies his upended tariff plans, injecting economic turbulence into an already strained relationship.】

item.title: 加拿大Mawer公司任命董事会成员埃里克·韦特劳弗为临时首席执行官
item.description: 莫威尔投资管理有限公司宣布，因布鲁斯·盖迪斯因个人原因休假，埃里克·韦特劳弗被任命为临时首席执行官。【原文：Mawer Investment Management Ltd. appointed Eric Wetlaufer as interim chief executive officer while Bruce Geddes takes a leave of absence due to personal circumstances, the firm said.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格小幅上涨，交易员权衡暴风雪与电力损失影响
item.description: 美国天然气期货周一小幅上涨，交易员将东北部地区遭遇暴风雪的因素纳入考量——这场风暴推高了供暖和发电厂燃料的需求，但同时导致该地区50万用户断电，部分抵消了需求增长。【原文：US natural gas futures rose slightly Monday as traders factored in a blizzard slamming into the Northeast pushing up demand for the heating and power-plant fuel being largely offset by the storm knocking out power for half a million customers in the region.】

item.title: 石油公司就气候变化诉讼案获最高法院听证
item.description: 美国最高法院同意受理埃克森美孚公司和太阳石油公司提出的上诉，此举旨在阻止数十起指控石油公司导致气候变化的城市及州级诉讼。【原文：The US Supreme Court agreed to hear an appeal by Exxon Mobil Corp. and Suncor Energy Inc. in an industry bid to stop dozens of city and state lawsuits that blame oil companies for climate change.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所和纳斯达克表示，暴风雪期间股市交易时间不变
item.description: 纽约证券交易所和纳斯达克公司表示，尽管冬季风暴席卷纽约地区，其市场将于周一照常运营。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange and Nasdaq Inc. said they will be operating their markets as normal on Monday as a winter storm sweeps through the New York area.】

item.title: 雅培公司启动债券发售以完成收购Exact Sciences交易
item.description: 雅培公司正分八期发行公司债券，以筹集约210亿美元资金用于收购癌症筛查公司Exact Sciences Corp。【原文：Abbott Laboratories is selling corporate bonds in as many as eight parts to help fund its around $21 billion acquisition of cancer-screening company Exact Sciences Corp.】

item.title: 以色列维持利率不变，因伊朗局势持续不明朗
item.description: 以色列维持利率不变，采取谨慎态度，因该国面临美国可能对伊朗发动袭击的局面。【原文：Israel kept interest rates unchanged, taking a cautious approach as the country faces the possibility of a US strike on Iran.】

item.title: 数据中心建设热潮推动电力设备制造商盈利激增
item.description: 电气设备制造商正争分夺秒地满足市场对关键部件的需求，这些部件将数据中心与电力系统相连接。对于少数垄断该市场的企业而言，这意味着创纪录的订单量和不断膨胀的积压订单。【原文：Electrical equipment manufacturers are racing to meet demand for the crucial parts that connect data centers to power. For the few companies cornering that market, that’s meant record orders and bloated backlogs.】

item.title: 旗舰支持的生物医药公司Generate计划通过IPO募资4.25亿美元
item.description: 生物医药公司Generate Biomedicines Inc.正计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达4.25亿美元资金。该公司利用人工智能技术进行药物研发，此举正值该领域上市活动显著升温之际。【原文：Generate Biomedicines Inc., a biotechnology firm using artificial intelligence in drug development, is seeking to raise as much as $425 millon in an initial public offering, as listing activity in the sector picks up sharply.】

item.title: 科桑考虑让天然气公司上市，因债务吞噬其糖业部门
item.description: 巴西综合企业科桑公司表示，正考虑出售其天然气和能源业务部门的股份，以减轻集团债务负担。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate Cosan SA said it is mulling a share sale of its gas and energy business unit as the group seeks to reduce its debt burden.】

item.title: 英国计划禁止无牌照博彩运营商参与体育博彩
item.description: 英国正考虑禁止无牌照博彩运营商赞助英国体育队伍，包括英超足球俱乐部，此举是更大范围打击黑市赌博、保护消费者权益的举措之一。【原文：The UK is considering barring unlicensed gambling operators from sponsoring UK sports teams including Premier League football clubs as part of a broader effort to rein in black-market gambling and protect consumers.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金抛售全球股票规模创四月以来新高
item.description: 高盛集团Prime服务台交易员称，对冲基金全球股票净抛售规模已达到2025年4月初关税危机以来的最高水平。【原文：Hedge funds’ net sales of global stocks reached the fastest pace since the tariff meltdown of early April 2025, according to traders on Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Prime Services Desk.】

item.title: 安哥拉今年非石油税收收入首次超越石油收入
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长维拉·戴维斯·德索萨表示，随着政府扩大税收基础，该国预计2026年非石油收入将首次超过石油收入。【原文：Angola expects revenue from non-oil sources to exceed oil receipts in 2026 for the first time as the government broadens its tax base, said Finance Minister Vera Daves de Sousa.】

item.title: 欧盟枢纽站自新俄罗斯制裁开始以来首次获得印度燃料
item.description: 一艘载有印度柴油的油轮已停靠欧洲最大港口，此次到港颇为引人注目——此前部分贸易商曾对违反针对购买俄罗斯原油制成品的新制裁表示担忧。【原文：A tanker carrying diesel from India has moored in Europe’s largest port, a notable arrival after some traders had expressed caution about falling foul of new sanctions on buying fuel made from Russian crude.】

item.title: 美联储沃勒称三月加息决定取决于劳动力市场状况
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒表示，他是否支持在下次政策会议上降息的决定，将取决于即将公布的劳动力市场数据。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said his decision on whether to support an interest-rate cut at the US central bank’s next policy meeting will hinge on upcoming labor-market data.】
